about_the_game:
This Support DLC does not add any gameplay content to the main game or prologue. Support further development with this purchase.


This DLC contains digital extras:
  • Unique 4k wallpapers for download.
  • Unique air freshener cosmetic item for your Mech.
  • If you join our discord and send me a private message, I will add your name to game credits!
We will add even more digital extras as game development progresses!
detailed_description:

name: Jupiter Moons: Mecha - Prologue: Support the Developers & Extras

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Graphics: 2GB memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Support the Developer DLC for Jupiter Moons: Mecha. Choose your mech, customize your loadout, and build your perfect deck. Experiment with cards to find powerful combinations as you enjoy the tactical combat and deckbuilding in this roguelike adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
